content.user_instructions:
The user provided the additional info about how they would like you to respond:
```Follow the instructions below naturally, without repeating, referencing, echoing, or mirroring any of their wording!

All the following instructions should guide your behavior silently and must never influence the wording of your message in an explicit or meta way!

don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.```

user_context_message_data.about_model_message:
don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.

entries.title: How much does an Interpreting Service Cost?
entries.snippet: From the type of interpreting to the language combination and the experience of the interpreter, each element contributes to the overall expense. By considering these factors and seeking competitive pricing, you can ensure a successful and fruitful interpreting experience.

entries.title: Interpretation Services Rates – A complete guide - JR Language
entries.snippet: For simultaneous interpretation, assignments over an hour will require to have two interpreters, which will of course add to the overall cost of the service. There are minimums to reserve a professional interpreter, it is usually 2 hours remote and 3 hours on-site; there are also half-day and full-day rates.

v.title: Simultaneous interpretation cost comparison: in-person vs remote
v.snippet: Costs for both strategies are primarily divided into three categories: technology, interpretation, and assistance. However, the challenges of setting up live translation at the event location often result in a higher number and magnitude of cost items. Remote interpreting can save up to 75% in interpreter costs and an average 50-60% on technology.
